text: 1. Consider the following program fragment written in a pseudo-language which uses static scope and where the primitive read (Y) allows the reading of the variable Y from standard input. int X = 0; int Y; void fie(){ X++; } void foo () { X++; fie(); } read(Y) ; if Y > 0{int X = 5; foo();} else fool(); write (X) ; State what the printed values are.
